title: HEAT Christmas wreath workshop
location: Back Garden at the Village Hall
description: Learn to make your own Christmas wreath to take home at this free, donation-welcome workshop. Rings are provided — please bring your own greenery, decorations, and scissors. Drinks and homemade cake will be available.
note: You can also ring 07518 024617 to secure your place.

title: Community litter pick: Sunday 30 November
description: Lend a hand keeping Hethersett tidy—join neighbours and friends for a friendly litter pick starting at 10:00am. All equipment is provided; please wear sturdy footwear and weather-ready clothing.

title: Community meetup: help us grow 100,000 trees
description: Hear how we have already planted over 1,500 trees locally and share ideas on how we reach our 100,000-tree goal by 2030.
